radiographic_examinations.findings: Diffuse angioectasia, edematous rectal mucosa, and small ulceration with blood over the recto-sigmoid junction.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: One month after initiating M-B enema therapy, no ulceration was observed, but the density of telangiectasia remained unchanged. There was a reduced extent of rectal mucosal congestion and hypervascularity. The histopathological analysis revealed an improvement in inflammatory cell infiltration.

radiographic_examinations.findings: No ulceration was observed, maintained density of telangiectasia, reduced extent of rectal mucosal congestion and hypervascularity.
